meanings.definition: Retaining green leaves throughout the year, but shedding some leaves seasonally.
meanings.sent1: The semievergreen tree looked beautiful in every season.
meanings.sent2: The garden had many semievergreen plants that added color all year round.
meanings.sent3: The semievergreen shrub decided to drop a few leaves just to keep things interesting.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was like a semievergreen tree, always vibrant but occasionally shedding worries.
meanings.sent5: The semievergreen forest painted a picture of everlasting life and change.

meanings.sent1: The semievergreen in the backyard provided shade and beauty.
meanings.sent2: I watered the semievergreen regularly to keep it healthy.
meanings.sent3: The semievergreen seemed to enjoy the attention it received from the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The semievergreen stood proudly among its evergreen and deciduous neighbors.
meanings.sent5: The semievergreen's leaves danced in the wind, a mix of green and gold.
